T02D2396:24a-1: sarba de ba dha nis ba na kra ma marga n'a ma /
T02D2396:24a-3: lha kun gyi rdzogs pa'i lam zhes bya ba /
T02D2396:24a-5: mi snyan sgra sogs spangs pa yi //
T02D2396:24a-6: bden zhing gtsang pa'i sa phyogs sam //
T02D2396:24a-7: yid dang mthun pa'i dgon pa ru //
T02D2396:24a-8: rim pa 'di bzhin bsgom par bya //
T02D2396:24a-9: shing gcig byang chub sems yin te //
T02D2396:24a-10: aa ba dh'u t'i'i chu 'gram la //
T02D2396:24a-11: lte ba'i gtum mo dur khrod de //
T02D2396:24a-12: ri thod snying ga'i padma la //
T02D2396:24a-13: dgon pa rnam snang gnas yin te //
T02D2396:24a-14: nags tshal padma'i gsang ba ru //
T02D2396:24a-15: bhi da dang ni rdo rje chu //
T02D2396:24a-16: byang chub sems dang bzhi mnyam dang //
T02D2396:24a-18: thig le'i gnas ni drug la bsgom //
T02D2396:24a-19: rnal 'byor pa yi sgrub sa bstan //
T02D2396:24a-20: de nas lus kyi mandala ni //
T02D2396:24b-0: rang bzhin @24b dri ma med pa'i rtsa //
T02D2396:24b-1: lhan cig skyes pa'i nyams dang ldan //
T02D2396:24b-2: zlum po nam mkha' lta bu ste //
T02D2396:24b-3: mthe bod tshad ni bde chen la //
T02D2396:24b-4: aom ma ma ham gnyis gang rung bsgom //
T02D2396:24b-5: me long lta bu'i yi shes kyis //
T02D2396:24b-6: mandala byin gyis brlabs byas nas //
T02D2396:24b-7: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni //
T02D2396:24b-8: rnal 'byor snying ga'i sgra gcan gyi //
T02D2396:24b-9: steng du h'um ni dud ka bsam //
T02D2396:24b-10: mi bskyod pa yi rgya mtsho la //
T02D2396:24b-11: aom ni skar ma lta bu ste //
T02D2396:24b-12: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni //
T02D2396:24b-13: mgrin pa'i 'khor lor bsam par bya //
T02D2396:24b-14: byang chub sems dang rakta dang //
T02D2396:24b-15: mi bskyod chu yi thig le'o //
T02D2396:24b-16: de ltar byin brlabs rtsa bsgoms nas //
T02D2396:24b-17: bsod nams tshogs ni bsag pa'i phyir //
T02D2396:24b-18: mtshan med rtsa dang 'khor lo bzhi //
T02D2396:24b-19: phyag rgya bzhi yi rgyas btab nas //
T02D2396:24b-20: thig le bzhi la nyams len bya //
T02D2396:24b-21: tshad med bzhi yi nyams skye'o //
T02D2396:24b-22: de ltar rnal 'byor bzhi bsgoms nas //
T02D2396:24b-23: rdzogs pa'i h'um bsam bgegs skrod do //
T02D2396:24b-24: snying ga'i khong stong dbus su ni //
T02D2396:24b-25: pam las padma ram nyi ma //
T02D2396:24b-27: phyi dang nang bgegs mtshams bcad do //
T02D2396:24b-28: de nas rnal 'byor stong nyid ni //
T02D2396:24b-29: skyil krung bcas shing lus nyid bsrang //
T02D2396:24b-30: mig gi dbang po sna rtser gtad //
T02D2396:24b-31: dngos po thams cad rjes dran nas //
T02D2396:24b-32: dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' la //
T02D2396:24b-33: skar ma lta bu'i sems nyid kyis //
T02D2396:24b-34: phra rab tsam gyi bdag gzhan ba bsgom //
T02D2396:24b-35: stong nyid lta ba bstan byas nas //
T02D2396:24b-36: rdzogs pa'i dbang gi rim pha ba bstan //
T02D2396:24b-37: rdo rje dril bu'i sbyor ba yi //
T02D2396:24b-38: rkan gyi phyogs su 'gyur lha mo //
T02D2396:24b-39: bde ba chen po'i zla rgyun ni //
T02D2396:24b-40: 'bebs sam dbang bskur lus tshim mo //
T02D2396:24b-41: de nas dpa' bo dpa' mo yis //
T02D2396:24b-42: gang yang dpal ldan 'dus pa'i sku //
T02D2396:24b-43: dri med me long gzugs brnyan dang //
T02D2396:24b-44: nam mkha'i skyes bu lta bu ni //
T02D2396:24b-45: rang bzhin kha dog dbyibs dang bral //
T02D2396:24b-46: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin ni //
T02D2396:24b-47: nam mkha'i dbyings su bsgom par bya //
T02D2396:24b-48: de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni //
T02D2396:24b-49: skal ldan rnams kyi don phyir brtsams //
T02D2396:24b-50: de yis dge ba gang thob ba //
T02D2396:24b-51: 'gro ba byang chub thob phyir bsngo //
